content.rendered: Rich and creamy texture, increased fat content, and unique flavor compared to cow’s milk make premium buffalo milk highly valued. It is prized for its nutritional profile as well because it has higher levels of vitamins, calcium, and protein. Owing to its special qualities, many people favour it for manufacturing dairy products like cheese and yoghurt.
